restaurant.description: Write a compelling description for a modern {cuisine} restaurant in {location}. Focus on ambiance, quality, and unique features. Keep it under 200 words.
restaurant.hero_text: Create an engaging hero section text for {restaurant_name}. Emphasize the dining experience and key differentiators.
restaurant.menu_intro: Write a warm introduction to the menu, highlighting seasonal ingredients and chef expertise.

business.about: Write a professional 'About Us' section for {company_name}, a {industry} company. Include mission, values, and key achievements.
business.services: Describe {service_name} service in detail, focusing on benefits and value proposition.
business.cta: Create a compelling call-to-action for {goal}. Make it urgent and benefit-focused.

image_prompts.restaurant_interior: Modern {style} restaurant interior, warm lighting, elegant decor, professional photography
image_prompts.food_plating: Beautifully plated {dish_type}, professional food photography, appetizing presentation
image_prompts.team_photo: Professional team photo, {team_size} people, corporate environment, friendly atmosphere
image_prompts.hero_image: Hero banner image for {business_type} website, professional, high quality

seo.meta_description: Generate SEO-optimized meta description for {page_type} page about {topic}. 150-160 characters, include primary keyword.
seo.title: Create compelling SEO title for {topic}. Include primary keyword, keep under 60 characters.
